title: Three matches in a row with nothing but botters for teammates
body: Riot, are you ever going to take this rampant problem seriously? Who am I kidding, of course you aren't.

replies.body: We definitely do our best, but since we don't actively monitor every single game we need those reports in order to do anything. Do your part and report any bots you see otherwise we won't be able to take action!

The problem is when you encounter a bot, report it, and then months later it's still going strong. Really puts a damper on motivation to bother reporting anything.

Like there was this one. Every time, instalocked Ryze. Would feed 10+ deaths spread among the other team. Would snipe the very rare kill if it happened to be nearby, usually just pulled assists (Ryze is incredibly overpowered under AI control, btw). If you ever happened to be near it while in the enemy base, it would use its ult to attempt to teleport you into the enemy's fountain.

Reported it on a few matches over the course of a couple days, then it stopped showing up in my matches... only to show up again in another match months later, doing the same old shit. At that point I simply sat back in my chair, and literally said out loud "Why did I even bother?"

Haven't seen it since that one match though, wouldn't be surprised if it finally got sold off on Ebay and is now being controlled by an actual player in norms/ranked.
